sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Form, Col, Row, InputGroup, Button, OverlayTrigger, Tooltip, Table, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { CSVLink } from "react-csv"; import '../index.css' class BondPricingOne extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { totalPrice: 0, totalInterest: 0, totalValue: 0, totalDenomination: 0, totalDate: null, month: this.getCurrentMonth(), year: this.getCurrentYear(), showTooltip: { visibility: 'visible' }, showCards: { visibility: 'hidden' }, hideTable: true, export: "Value as of, Serial #, Series, Denomination, Issue Date, Next Accrual, Final Maturity, Issue Price, Interest, Value", exportResults: [] }; this.onUpdateEnter = this.onUpdateEnter.bind(this) this.onUpdateClick = this.onUpdateClick.bind(this) this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this) this.formatDate = this.formatDate.bind(this) this.appendToTable = this.appendToTable.bind(this) this.exportData = this.exportData.bind(this) } formatDate(value_date) { const months = { "01": "Jan.", "02": "Feb.", "03": "March", "04": "April", "05": "May", "06": "June", "07": "July", "08": "Aug.", "09": "Sept", "10": "Oct", "11": "Nov", "12": "Dec" } let month = value_date.split('/')[0] let year = value_date.split('/')[1] let month_string = months[month] + ' 1, ' + year return month_string } getCurrentMonth() { let d = new Date(); return d.getMonth() + 1 } getCurrentYear() { let d = new Date(); return d.getFullYear() } handleClickX(element) { element.parentNode.parentNode.remove() if ((document.getElementById('bond-table').getElementsByClassName('bond-row')).length > 0) { this.onUpdateClick(); } else { this.setState({ totalPrice: 0, totalInterest: 0, totalValue: 0, totalDenomination: 0 }) } } appendToTable(currentBond) { const bondTable = document.getElementById('bond-table') let bondBody = null if (bondTable.getElementsByTagName('tbody').length === 0) { bondBody = document.createElement('tbody') bondTable.append(bondBody) } else { bondBody = bondTable.getElementsByTagName('tbody')[0] } if (currentBond['interest'] < 0) { currentBond['interest'] = 0 } bondTable.getElementsByTagName('tr')[0].style.visibility = 'visible' let bondRow = bondBody.insertRow(); bondRow.className = "bond-row" bondRow.style.textAlign = 'center' bondRow.insertCell(0).innerHTML = currentBond['serialNumber'] bondRow.insertCell(1).innerHTML = currentBond['series'] let cell2 = bondRow.insertCell(2) cell2.className = 'bond-denomination' cell2.innerHTML = '$' + this.convertValues(currentBond['denomination']) bondRow.insertCell(3).innerHTML = currentBond['iDate'] bondRow.insertCell(4).innerHTML = currentBond['aDate'] bondRow.insertCell(5).innerHTML = currentBond['mDate'] let cell6 = bondRow.insertCell(6) cell6.className = 'bond-price' cell6.innerHTML = '$' + this.convertValues(parseFloat(currentBond['iPrice']).toFixed(2)) let cell7 = bondRow.insertCell(7) cell7.className = 'bond-interest' cell7.innerHTML = '$' + this.convertValues(parseFloat(currentBond['interest']).toFixed(2)) let cell8 = bondRow.insertCell(8) cell8.className = 'bond-value' cell8.innerHTML = '$' + this.convertValues(parseFloat(currentBond['value']).toFixed(2)) cell8.style.position = 'relative' let span = document.createElement('span') span.innerHTML = '×' span.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true') span.style.border = 'none'; let button = document.createElement('button') button.onclick = () => { this.handleClickX(button) }; button.className = 'close' button.style.position = 'absolute' button.style.right = '-1em' button.append(span); cell8.append(button); this.exportData() } onUpdateEnter(e) { e.preventDefault(); setTimeout(() => { this.setState({ showTooltip: { visibility: 'hidden' } }) }, 3500) } onUpdateClick() { const bondState = this.state.bonds let bonds = [] for (let i = 0; i < bondState.length; i++) { let bond = { 'vMonth': document.getElementsByName('aMonth')[0].value, 'vYear': document.getElementsByName('aYear')[0].value, 'series': this.state.bonds[i]['series'], 'denomination': this.state.bonds[i]['denomination'], 'serialNumber': this.state.bonds[i]['serialNumber'], 'iDate': this.state.bonds[i]['iDate'] } bonds.push(bond) } const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify({ bonds }) }; fetch('http://localhost:5000/update', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { this.setState({ totalDate: this.formatDate(response[1]['totalDate']), totalDenomination: response[1]['totalDenominations'], totalPrice: response[1]['totalPrices'], totalInterest: response[1]['totalInterests'], totalValue: response[1]['totalValues'] }) this.setState({ bonds: response[0] }) }) } onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); if (this.state.hideTable) { this.setState({ hideTable: false, showCards: { visibility: 'visible' } }) } const series_map = { 'EE Bond': 'EE', 'E Bond': 'E', 'I Bond': 'I', 'Savings Bond': 'S' } let bond = { 'vMonth': e.target.aMonth.value, 'vYear': e.target.aYear.value, 'series': series_map[e.target.series.value], 'denomination': (e.target.denomination.value).substring(1), 'serialNumber': e.target.serialnumber.value, 'iMonth': e.target.iMonth.value, 'iYear': e.target.iYear.value } const requestOptions = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*' }, body: JSON.stringify({ bond }) }; fetch('http://localhost:5000/individual/bonds', requestOptions) .then(response => response.json()) .then(response => { this.appendToTable(response) this.setState({ currentBond: response }) let values = [ response['vDate'], response['serialNumber'], response['series'], '$' + response['denomination'], response['iDate'], response['aDate'], response['mDate'], '$' + response['iPrice'], '$' + response['interest'], '$' + response['value'] ] this.setState({ totalDate: this.formatDate(response['vDate']), totalDenomination: this.state.totalDenomination + parseFloat(response['denomination']), totalPrice: this.state.totalPrice + parseFloat(response['iPrice']), totalInterest: this.state.totalInterest + parseFloat(response['interest']), totalValue: this.state.totalValue + parseFloat(response['value']) }) this.setState({ export: this.state.export.concat("," + values.toString()) }) this.exportData() }) } convertValues(value) { return value.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g, ",") } render() { return (
VALUE AS OF / Revalue all bonds by this date. }> SERIES DENOMINATION SERIAL NUMBER ISSUE DATE /
{this.state.exportResults.length > 0 ?
0 ? this.state.exportResults : ''}>+ [Export]
: null} VALUED AS OF {this.state.totalDate} TOTAL FACE VALUE ${this.convertValues(this.state.totalDenomination)} TOTAL COST ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(this.state.totalPrice).toFixed(2))} TOTAL INTEREST ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(this.state.totalInterest).toFixed(2))} TOTAL VALUE ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(this.state.totalValue).toFixed(2))}
{ this.state.bonds.length > 0 ?
{this.state.bonds .slice(this.state.currentPage * this.state.perPage, (this.state.currentPage + 1) * this.state.perPage) .map((bond, i) => ( ))}
Serial Number Series Denomination Issue Date Next Accrual Final Maturity Issue Price Interest Value
{bond['serialNumber']} {bond['series']} ${this.convertValues(bond['denomination'])} {bond['iDate']} {bond['aDate']} {bond['mDate']} ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(bond['iPrice']).toFixed(2))} ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(bond['interest']).toFixed(2))} ${this.convertValues(parseFloat(bond['value']).toFixed(2))}
{this.state.bonds.length > this.state.perPage ? {this.state.pages.map((i) => ( this.setCurrentPage(i)}>{i + 1} ))} : null}
: null}
) } } export default BondPricingOne;
